title: Where are the rewards?
body: Ok so twelve hours ago you make a post and i quote "Over the next twelve hours or so we'll start doling out rewards, and you should see your shiny new borders, icons, as well as the new skins" its been twelve hours, i still have no rewards.....Rito pls.{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: Everyone who is eligible for rewards will receive them before the 18th of November.
They'll be given out over the week.
